name: devHero
description:
This is my first project ever released!
Decided to finally join a game jam after a few weeks of studying Unity Engine... 

I had a few more ideas in mind while building the game and I was totally going for a different style BUT.. I joined the jam 6 days late with only 24 hours left on the clock :)

This is the best I could do in an evening time!

I hope to be greatly ashamed of this thing someday.

(Spoiler: I already am)
